title.narrative: The quality of education delivered through public schools has been enhanced through improved teaching and learning, the development of more diversified pathways in the formal education system and the implementation of robust learning and competency standards inclusive of life skills.UNDAF/ Produit 4.1 Les institutions d'éducation et de formation ont des capacités renforcées pour assurer une éducation de meilleure qualité

description.narrative: The institutional context hindered progress on important reforms tied to the basic education cycle and curriculum and delayed the scaling-up of promising initiatives, such as a national reading instruction programme in mother tongue. Nevertheless UNICEF supported formulation of a policy framework promoting mother tongue as the main medium of instruction in early grades and provided essential learning materials to 452 education facilities and more than 10,000 pupils, mostly from disadvantaged groups and rural areas. UNICEF also continued to enhance teacher capacity, especially in relation to child protection and management of multi-grade classrooms in rural areas. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
